document.full_text: today in san francisco, six global environmental activists, each representing one of the inhabited continents, will receive a $150,000 goldman environmental prize for grassroots environmental work.
document.title: six $150,000 goldman enviromental prizes awarded
lines_and_colors: today in san francisco, six global environmental activists, each representing one of the inhabited continents, will receive a $150,000 goldman environmental prize for grassroots environmental work.
